general.description:
Initially established as a mere mining outpost, the colony has thrived with trade when a route to the Planetarist Alliance was discovered.
However, its harsh living conditions don't encourage new settlers to come in and skaraformation to any extent would spoil the resources-rich mines, so the population stays quite low and is mainly comprised of miners and traders living in dome cities.
general.bar: Hardened miners talking of their latest discoveries
